attributes.description: This dashboard gives you high-level insights in the metrics exposed by the ESS billing API.

0ea16e71-0cd4-4578-a0cc-8b5325fcd01bX0.label: Part of Total cost for period

params.formula:
sum(
    ess.billing.total_ecu,
    kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d'
) / (
        (
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1
)

args.name: subtract
args.text:
max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')

args.name: divide
args.text:
(
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24)

args.name: add
args.text:
(
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1

tinymathAst.name: divide
tinymathAst.text:
sum(
    ess.billing.total_ecu,
    kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d'
) / (
        (
        max(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        -
        min(@timestamp,
        kql='@timestamp > now-7d/d')
        ) / (1000*3600*24) + 1
)

embeddableConfig.description: Run rate computed from the recent consumption

sourceDescriptor.esql:
from metrics-*
| WHERE data_stream.dataset == "ess_billing.billing"
| STATS cloud.geo.name=VALUES(cloud.geo.name), ess.billing.total_ecu=SUM(ess.billing.total_ecu) BY cloud.geo.location

attributes.title: [Metrics ESS Billing] Billing dashboard
